free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for individuals starting with basic scheduling

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: For professionals who need advanced features

team.name: Team
team.description: For teams that collaborate on scheduling

faq.question: Can I change my plan later?
faq.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

faq.question: What happens when I exceed my quota?
faq.answer: When you reach 100% of your quota, features will be disabled until the next billing cycle or you upgrade your plan. We'll notify you at 80% usage.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. No questions asked.

faq.question: How does the Evolution API vs Twilio work for WhatsApp?
faq.answer: Evolution API (Pro plan) is perfect for small-scale WhatsApp integration. Twilio (Team plan) provides enterprise-grade reliability and compliance for larger teams.

faq.question: Can I use external video links with the free plan?
faq.answer: Yes! The free plan supports external video links from Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams. Smart Video Rooms with built-in recording/transcription require Pro or higher.
